Reviews.Title: Sharp Aquos is a good buy
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Jackson
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews some positive and some negative, I went with the positive ones and my own experiences with other Sharp products.  I have had a Sharp Aquos LD37D44U 37-Inch LCD HDTV for about a month and must say that I am very pleased with it so far.The picture quality is very good and it has every connection that you may want on the back.  I am using the HDMI connection from a HDTV Verizon FIOS Box.I have no problems with any lines or dead pixels as some have written about.  If you are looking to buy a solid TV and not over pay for a name, then consider buying one of the Sharp Aquos LCD TVs.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: B. Allison
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up and great picture for the price.  6ms refresh rate makes the picture blur at times, but happens very rarely.  Owned it for one month with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD HDTV...
Reviews.Author: Edgar R. Rodriguez "erroc2k"
Reviews.Content: Excelent image, great colors. The software is a little slow (when you change channels) but it's ok. If you just want it to watch TV 720p is fine. I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Sharp 37-inch 720 LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: H. Nelson
Reviews.Content: I believe this product to be excellent in every way and is a great value for its price. My initial purchase about six months ago was for myself. We have enjoyed it so much, I purchased a second on behalf of my bother in law. They also agree with my opinion. Again, an excellent product.

Reviews.Title: costly repair
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Sharp TV from Amazon in 2008. It worked fine until last week. When I attempted to turn it on the power light blinked off and on. Took it into repair shop. Was .informed the motherboard and power supply were shor and it would cost more to fix than replace.

Reviews.Title: HD TV by Sharp
Reviews.Author: loubrooklyn
Reviews.Content: Liked the price and the no sales tax, no shipping charges and very happy with the product. It does hesitate before bringing up the HD picture and I don't know if that's due to the TV or Comcast. Delivery and set-up was excellent.  Would buy again from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price, perfect size for us
Reviews.Author: L.A. Daddy
Reviews.Content: We wanted a flat screen HDTV to fit in our armoire.  It was either this set or a high end 32".  We went with size (this 37") over higher quality.  My feeling was that since this would be our first HDTV, it was going to be an upgrade no matter what.  And I'm really happy with the purchase.  I can't complain at all - seems like a great set to me.  I think the hi-def is really impressive - it's crisp and the colors look vibrant and natural to me both on HD broadcasts and blu-ray.  Most of the stuff we watch is 1080i which looks great and seems to be a lot better than the 720p stuff (thought I read somewhere that 1080i didn't look so good on this set but it looks great to me).  My only gripe is there's no headphone jack but if you've got a receiver, that won't be an issue for you.

Reviews.Title: Rob
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Merritt
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. I got a excellent price value. I have had this item for 7 months with no problem at all.

Reviews.Title: Good TV but the sound really sucks!
Reviews.Author: Rafael Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This TV has everything you want... but the built in speakers are VERY POOR!!! you will need a home theater to get the sound you expected.

Reviews.Title: This is a very nice 37 inch HDTV, and it fits my entertainment center
Reviews.Author: Ben Sweet
Reviews.Content: Positives: We are very limited in the size of a high def tv because our entertainment center has a limited width. The Sharp LC37D44U was the only 37-inch set that we found that would fit, and it touches the sides of the cabinet on both sides. There really aren't many 37 inch sets to choose from....lots of 32 inch, 40 inch, and 42 inch, but not many 37 inch. The tv set arrived in perfect condition, it set up easily and quickly, and the picture quality is great. I use a surround sound system, so I can't really comment on the TV sound. I just turn it off.Negatives:I'm not very happy with the instructions that came with it....just one big sheet of paper, printed on both sides, that folds and folds and folds. I would much prefer a booklet. Also, because I have several audio and video components there are not quite enough input/output terminals. But with a little ingenuity you can get everything connected.I would recommend it based on picture quality and ease of setup.

Reviews.Title: good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: eEraser
Reviews.Content: The picture is good and the sound is good. I wish the controls would let me customize it some more and if this was my primary TV, I would need it to be 1080p, but for the price, it is a good deal and a nice unit.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: George A. Jimenez
Reviews.Content: great deal, great TV , great price, delivered fast -cant ask for more than that!

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Thierry Henry
Reviews.Content: Great Picture, great value, somewhat slow channel reception, but from my experience, that's Sharp in general.  Overall: very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: M. Brown "Tea Lover"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my daughter for Christmas and she was thrilled.  She loves it and says it is the best TV ever.

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: skonka
Reviews.Content: Unit was delivered fast but was DOA.  Box was pristine. Called Sharp and they wanted to perform service on it.  Not happy about a $700 display with zero hours needing service. Disappointing a major manufacturer's quality control can let this happen in this day and age.  Unit returned and will be looking for another brand.

Reviews.Title: It is a POS
Reviews.Author: unix/guru
Reviews.Content: It arrived broke out of the box.  Packing is poor - when I opened the box and saw the POOR amount of styrofoam I got worried.  Thanks to Sharp, my worries were confirmed.  It wouldn't even power up.  The manual is poor.  I waited on hold forever (20 minutes) to reach a CSR who after doing the same things I had done, transferred me to dispatch (for a CSR) where I waited on hold for another 10 minutes.  Then when a new CSR picked up, verified my case # and name, had to get someone else!  Boy these guys sure love the hold button!!!!.  They 'might' be able to come out and check it in 2 weeks.  I was also put on hold by "Dispatch".  Customer Services is HORRIBLE.  At this point I really think I will just return it and pay the shipping myself to be rid of it.  I will NEVER buy a Sharp product again.  I give it one star because there is no ZERO star option.  Stay away.

Reviews.Title: Two TVs ordered, Two TVs arrived damanged
Reviews.Author: zenthink
Reviews.Content: Honestly I don't know if this is a result of poor quality on Sharp's part or poor shipping process on UPS's part or poor packaging on J&R;'s part.However, I have ordered two of these TV's and both arrived damaged. The first one would not power on. The green power light just kept flashing. So I returned it and ordered another. The second one came with dark spots on the screen that will not go away. It's not a smudge it's damage to the LCD screen itself.I will not buy another one nor will I buy another Samsung TV ever again.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TV
Reviews.Author: W. Lachar
Reviews.Content: I just received and set up this TV.  It has only turned on once (by the grace of God).  It will not power up currently through any remote or the TV itself.  This is the 2nd review saying the same thing within 3 days.  DO NOT BE ANOTHER SUCKER LIKE US!
